content.rendered:
Warning: Not suitable for children under 36 months.

Logical deduction game!

The ender dragon wants to hinder your journey through the Minecraft worlds by presenting you with 40 different, increasing in difficulty challenges. Solve the tasks to get ahead and use your strongest weapon, your brain! In this brain-twisting deduction game, you must follow the positive and negative pictorial clues to correctly place the Minecraft weapons and armor on the grid. If you followed all the instructions correctly when laying the pattern, you’ve won!

Minecraft Logic Mods (Travel Game)a game for 1 player aged 10 to 100 years.
